articles.title: In Major Gaffe, US President Joe Biden Points To "Selfishness" Of US Troops In Saudi Speech - NDTV
articles.description: On the final day of his Middle East tour, US President Joe Biden accidentally praised the "selfishness" of American troops. The verbal gaffe came as Mr Biden delivered prepared remarks to leaders of the Gulf Cooperation Council in Jeddah on Saturday.
articles.content:
Joe Biden praised US troops for "selfishness" but quickly corrected to "selflessness". (File)
On the final day of his Middle East tour, United States President Joe Biden accidentally pointed to the … [+2373 chars]

articles.description: In the place they call "TrackTown USA", American sprinters swept the podium Saturday night in the men's 100-metre final at the world athletics championships.

articles.title: Burden of diabetes and hyperglycaemia in adults in the Americas, 1990–2019: a systematic analysis for the Global Burden of Disease Study 2019 - The Lancet
articles.description:
The burden of diabetes in the Americas is large, increasing, heterogeneous, and expanding.
To confront the rising burden, population-based interventions aimed to reduce type
2 diabetes risk and strengthening health systems to provide effective and cost-effici…
articles.content: Legetic B, Medici A, Hernández-Avila M, Alleyne GA, Hennis A. Economic Dimensions of Non-Communicable Disease in Latin America and the Caribbean. Disease Control Priorities. Companion Volume, 2016.
